name: designtokens
description: Awesome design tokens for the Bricks & Braces brand.

scripts.format:fix: DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint --fix --cache --cache-strategy content . && prettier --write . && stylelint "**/*.?(p)css" --fix --formatter verbose
scripts.format:check: DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint --cache --cache-strategy content . && prettier --check . && stylelint "**/*.?(p)css" --formatter verbose

author: moin@bricksandbraces.com
